name: Monster House
overview: Your sister is a paranormal investigator who went to visit a renowned ghost house. She has disappeared in this manor full of monsters. You’ve decided to go there to rescue her. As you explore this Monster House, you pick up all the things she has lost along the way: shoes, flashlight, cameras and all her ghost-hunting equipment. Your flashlight is your only means of fighting the supernatural horrors that inhabit here, so you’d better keep it stocked with fresh batteries. This game was converted from the MSX version.
